original_text:
Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness
La Spinomenal ha appena rilasciato Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness, la slot ambientata in Egitto con una vincita superiore a 1.000.000x!
Un reebot stupendo
Dopo aver visitato la foresta amazzonica, Lucky Jack, noto esploratore creato della software house Spinomenal, è pronto per avventurarsi nella piramide per andare alla ricerca di un misterioso libro magico, custode di numerosi segreti.
Come tutte le slot a tema egizio, anche qui la grafica è uno dei punti di forza del gioco. I simboli di grandi dimensioni sono definiti benissimo, con linee nitide e colori brillanti che contribuiscono a creare un bel contrasto con l’ambientazione notturna. La musica di sottofondo ha poco a che fare con le sonorità orientaleggianti che di solito troviamo nelle slot a tema egizio, ma il mood incalzante crea la giusta atmosfera per le giocate.
Caratteristiche di Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness
La griglia di gioco è una 6×3, con 10 linee di pagamento fisse. Si vince associando simboli identici dal rullo di sinistra procedendo verso destra. Nel caso si ottengano più vincite su una stessa linea, verrà pagata soltanto la più alta, mentre se le combo vengano su linee diverse, allora le somme verranno sommate.
Premendo il tasto Autoplay si darà il via ai giri automatici ma a differenza di altre slot, qua non è possibile impostarne un numero predefinito. L’icona del coniglio rappresenta a funzione Turbo e accelererà la rotazione dei rulli.
La scommessa minima è di 0,1 moneta per linea, con il singolo giro che costa 1 moneta. Naturalmente la puntata può essere innalzata a piacimento.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore è pari al 96,01%.
Come giocare a Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness
Il meccanismo di gioco è molto semplice, prima però è utile fare una panoramica sui simboli paganti, suddivisibili in due categorie: basso livello e alto livello. Al primo gruppo appartengono le carte da gioco buone per una scala reale, dal 10 all’asso. Quelli a tema egizio sono invece i simboli che pagano di più: in ordine crescente troviamo la croce, l’uccello, il gatto e naturalmente Lucky Jack.
Il libro è il nostro Wild/Scatter pagante. Wild, perché ricopre la funzione di Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli, oltre a fungere da moltiplicatore. 3 Wild moltiplicano la vincita per 2, con 4 libri il moltiplicatore sarà x25, con 5 arriviamo a x250 e con 6 x500.
Il libro ricopre anche la funzione di Scatter perché assegna dieci Free Spins, durante i quali un simbolo casuale diventerà a espansione, andando a ricoprire l’intero rullo. Se durante il gioco Bonus atterrano altri Scatter, ci verranno assegnati ulteriori Free Spins. La funzione speciale può inoltre essere acquistata.

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è la puntata minima in questa slot?

Si va da un minimo di 0,1 monete virtuali per linea, quindi una moneta a Spin.



Dove posso giocare a Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness?

Questa slot è disponibile in tutti i principali casinò online.



In Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness ci sono sia il Wild che lo Scatter?

No, abbiamo un unico simbolo che ricopre entrambe le funzioni, quella di Jolly e quella per dare avvio ai Free Spins.

Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness
Spinomenal has just released Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness, the Egyptian-themed slot with a win of over 1,000,000x! 
A stunning reboot
After exploring the Amazon forest, the well-known explorer created by Spinomenal, Lucky Jack, is ready to venture into the pyramid to search for a mysterious magical book that holds numerous secrets. 
As with all Egyptian-themed slots, the graphics are a strong point of the game. The large symbols are well-defined, with sharp lines and bright colors that create a beautiful contrast with the dark nighttime setting. The background music has little to do with the typically oriental sounds found in Egyptian-themed slots, but the intense mood creates the right atmosphere for the games. 
Features of Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness 
The game grid is a 6x3, with 10 fixed paylines. You win by matching identical symbols from the left reel to the right. If multiple wins are obtained on the same line, only the highest one will be paid, while if combos are on different lines, the sums will be added. 
Pressing the Autoplay button will start automatic spins, but unlike other slots, a predetermined number cannot be set. The rabbit icon represents the Turbo function and will accelerate the rotation of the reels. 
The minimum bet is 0.1 coin per line, with a single spin costing 1 coin. Of course, the bet can be raised as desired. 
The theoretical return to player is 96.01%. 
How to play Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness 
The game engine is very simple, but it is useful to take a look at the paying symbols first, which can be divided into two categories: low level and high level. The first group includes the playing cards good for a royal flush, from 10 to Ace. The Egyptian-themed symbols, on the other hand, pay the most: in ascending order we find the cross, bird, cat and of course Lucky Jack. 
The book is our paying Wild/Scatter. Wild because it takes on the function of a Joker and replaces all symbols, as well as acting as a multiplier. 3 Wilds multiply winnings by 2, 4 books bring the multiplier to x25, 5 to x250 and 6 to x500. 
The book also covers the Scatter function because it assigns ten Free Spins, during which a random symbol will expand, covering the entire reel. If more Scatters land during the Bonus game, additional Free Spins will be awarded.  The special function can also be purchased.

What is the minimum bet in this slot?

The minimum bet is 0.1 virtual coins per line, so one coin per Spin.

Where can I play Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness?

This slot is available at all major online casinos.

Does Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness have both Wild and Scatter?

No, we have a single symbol that covers both functions, as a Joker and to initiate Free Spins.

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness is a 6x3 slot with 10 fixed paylines. The object of the game is to match identical symbols from left reel to the right. Pressing the Autoplay button will start automatic spins, but a predetermined number of spins cannot be set. The rabbit icon represents the Turbo function and will accelerate the rotation of the reels. The book is both the Wild and Scatter symbol and will replace all symbols and multiply winnings. The book also assigns ten Free Spins, during which a random symbol will expand to cover the entire reel. If more Scatters land during the Bonus game, more Free Spins will be awarded.

Graphics and Sounds

Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness features stunning graphics with well-defined, brightly colored symbols that create a beautiful contrast with the dark nighttime setting. The background music has a unique sound that isn't typically found in Egyptian-themed slots but creates the right atmosphere for the game.

Theme

Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness is an Egyptian-themed slot with a storyline that follows the well-known explorer, Lucky Jack, as he ventures into the pyramid to search for a magical book. The graphics, symbols, and background music create an intense mood that fits well with the game's theme.

Betting Options

The minimum bet in Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness is 0.1 virtual coins per line, with a single spin costing 1 coin. The bet can be raised as desired, and the game offers a Turbo function to accelerate the rotation of the reels. 

Return to Player Percentage

Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness has a theoretical return to player percentage of 96.01%, which is a good ratio for slot games. With a potential win of over 1,000,000x, this game is sure to keep players engaged and entertained for hours.

Review: Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness
Spinomenal has just released Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness, the Egyptian-themed slot with a win of over 1,000,000x! 
A stunning reboot
After exploring the Amazon forest, the well-known explorer created by Spinomenal, Lucky Jack, is ready to venture into the pyramid to search for a mysterious magical book that holds numerous secrets. 
As with all Egyptian-themed slots, the graphics are a strong point of the game. The large symbols are well-defined, with sharp lines and bright colors that create a beautiful contrast with the dark nighttime setting. The background music has little to do with the typically oriental sounds found in Egyptian-themed slots, but the intense mood creates the right atmosphere for the games. 
Features of Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness 
The game grid is a 6x3, with 10 fixed paylines. You win by matching identical symbols from the left reel to the right. If multiple wins are obtained on the same line, only the highest one will be paid, while if combos are on different lines, the sums will be added. 
Pressing the Autoplay button will start automatic spins, but unlike other slots, a predetermined number cannot be set. The rabbit icon represents the Turbo function and will accelerate the rotation of the reels. 
The minimum bet is 0.1 coin per line, with a single spin costing 1 coin. Of course, the bet can be raised as desired. 
The theoretical return to player is 96.01%. 
How to play Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness 
The game engine is very simple, but it is useful to take a look at the paying symbols first, which can be divided into two categories: low level and high level. The first group includes the playing cards good for a royal flush, from 10 to Ace. The Egyptian-themed symbols, on the other hand, pay the most: in ascending order we find the cross, bird, cat and of course Lucky Jack. 
The book is our paying Wild/Scatter. Wild because it takes on the function of a Joker and replaces all symbols, as well as acting as a multiplier. 3 Wilds multiply winnings by 2, 4 books bring the multiplier to x25, 5 to x250 and 6 to x500. 
The book also covers the Scatter function because it assigns ten Free Spins, during which a random symbol will expand, covering the entire reel. If more Scatters land during the Bonus game, additional Free Spins will be awarded.  The special function can also be purchased.

The minimum bet is 0.1 virtual coins per line, so one coin per Spin.

Where can I play Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness?

This slot is available at all major online casinos.

Does Lucky Jack Book of Rebirth Egyptian Darkness have both Wild and Scatter?

No, we have a single symbol that covers both functions, as a Joker and to initiate Free Spins.
